/var/lib/zerotier-one.description: Choose a share for ZeroTier configuration. E.g.: create a Share called ZeroTier-config for this purpose alone.
/var/lib/zerotier-one.label: ZeroTier config

ZEROTIER_ONE_LOCAL_PHYS.description: a space-separated list of physical interfaces that should be configured to participate in NAT-based routing.
ZEROTIER_ONE_LOCAL_PHYS.label: Interfaces

ZEROTIER_ONE_USE_IPTABLES_NFT.description: controls the command the container uses to set up NAT forwarding. Try false as default. true if having problems
ZEROTIER_ONE_USE_IPTABLES_NFT.label: Use NFT

ZEROTIER_ONE_GATEWAY_MODE.description: controls the traffic direction. inbound. outbound. or both, use the word both
ZEROTIER_ONE_GATEWAY_MODE.label: Mode

ZEROTIER_ONE_NETWORK_IDS.description: a space-separated list of ZeroTier network IDs. This variable is only effective on first launch.
ZEROTIER_ONE_NETWORK_IDS.label: Secret ID
